title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Collections
body: Collections       Access Minute Man collections online. You will find a representation of the types of artifacts included in the park's museum collection. There are archeological artifacts, both pre-contact and historic, and drawings for the Margaret Sidney books, including ones done by Childe Hassam, the American Impressionist.  Also included are items that the Lothrop Family used while living in The Wayside.
